summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2330 for the improvement of Franklin Avenue from Eastlake Ave to a point sixty feet north of Nelson Place on the east; and returning certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, by construction of water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, trees, crossed hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection.
